column4: lol atleast XP runs on my system .. I have yet to get Ubuntu to run correctly
- What can the room help you with?
- What is the stopping point?
I get a kernel panic - not syncing error about 60 seconds after machine boots
- Did you spot the module/app loaded at boot that might cause it?
nope everything boots fine
LiveCD doesnt work .. doesnt recognize my mouse or keyboard
- What are your system specifications?
AMD64 3800+ Gigabyte GA-K8N Ultra-9 Motherboard 2 gig of ram ATI X800XL Graphics card installing to a 80gig ATA HD instead of SATA at this point
- (Drool) Nice rig.
lol will be if I can get something other than WinXP installed
- a boot log would be golden. - not sure it's possible with the live CD. - :/
Ill see if I can get it .. brb
only error I could find was about hardware system clock
- wDo you think commenting it out would work for a bit?
- it makes me nervous
well the weird bit is this .. I can boot to rescue mode and it doesnt kernel panic .. and .. it doesnt error on loading hardware clock
- give me a sec. the wiki has something i think.
- Gathered more info but no solution it seems fairly common. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=28677 http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=35994
danke .. Ill see where I can go from there .. thanks for the assist
neither of those linked forum issues are related to my problem =) but thanks for trying
- I hope you can install Ubuntu it's a pleasure having you in this channel. - good luck.
